page.title: 09CLUBS AND ORGANISATIONS
page.content: There are several organisations which take place in our area.Many of them meet in the school after four or in the evenings. {CUBS. Every Friday at 3.30 we go to the Community Centre for cubs.There are 26 cubs and two leaders so altogether there are 28 people in one room and as you can imagine it can be rather noisy When we arrive the first thing we do is to have the Grand Howl followed by games,knotting,and compass work.If the weather is fine we lay trails outside and have treasure hunts.When we come back inside we have flag down and say a prayer before we go home at 5.30. {BROWNIES There is a Brown Owl a Tawny Owl and a Barn Owl at Brownies but these are not people they are the leaders.First we give in our subs and then go to our
